enumerators.name: FeedStock
enumerators.description: Feedstock - sets a predefined composition for the fluid to be processed

options.name: MSW
options.description: Organic matter from Municipal Solid Waste

options.name: user
options.description: user specified - initial composition set to manure from milk-producing cows, user adjustable

enumerators.name: PlantSize
enumerators.description: Plant size - sets the plant size in terms of net electical energy power output

options.name: 0.1MW
options.description: 0.1 MW net electical energy power output

options.name: 0.5MW
options.description: 0.5 MW net electical energy power output

options.name: 1MW
options.description: 1 MW net electical energy power output

options.name: 2MW
options.description: 2 MW net electical energy power output

options.name: user
options.description: user specified - initial net electical energy power output 1 MW, user adjustable
